ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: Connecting WAN Interfaces

STEP.DESCRIPTION:
Connecting two routers together via WAN serial interfaces requires certain pieces of equipment to be connected in the proper order.
Choose the correct equipment necessary to connect two routers via WAN serial interfaces and place them in the order that they should be connected.

ACTIVITY.MESSAGE:
Congratulations, this activity has
been successfully completed.
